attributes.action: instruct the Lord Coe, the Chairman of London 2012 to change the Olympics 2012 Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo does not have public support. On the BBC website 17000 votes have been cast on what people thought of the logo, and 70% voted for "Wooden Spoon".

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
